00034 #define EPABORT_BREAK_LOOP_COUNT 15000              /* Approx. 100 ms */

00036 /* NOTE: The sequence of error message strings must agree with the    */
00037 /*       definition of USB_Status_TypeDef enum.                       */
00038 static const char * const errMsg[] =
00039 {
00040   [  USB_STATUS_OK                  ] = "No errors",
00041   [ -USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR             ] = "Setup request error",
00042   [ -USB_STATUS_EP_BUSY             ] = "Endpoint is busy",
00043   [ -USB_STATUS_REQ_UNHANDLED       ] = "Setup request not handled",
00044   [ -USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL             ] = "Illegal operation attempted",
00045   [ -USB_STATUS_EP_STALLED          ] = "Endpoint is stalled",
00046   [ -USB_STATUS_EP_ABORTED          ] = "Transfer aborted",
00047   [ -USB_STATUS_EP_ERROR            ] = "Transfer error",
00048   [ -USB_STATUS_EP_NAK              ] = "Endpoint NAK",
00049   [ -USB_STATUS_DEVICE_UNCONFIGURED ] = "Device is not configured",
00050   [ -USB_STATUS_DEVICE_SUSPENDED    ] = "Device is suspended",
00051   [ -USB_STATUS_DEVICE_RESET        ] = "Device has been reset",
00052   [ -USB_STATUS_TIMEOUT             ] = "Transfer timeout",
00053   [ -USB_STATUS_DEVICE_REMOVED      ] = "Device removed",
00054   [ -USB_STATUS_HC_BUSY             ] = "Host channel is busy",
00055   [ -USB_STATUS_DEVICE_MALFUNCTION  ] = "Device malfunction",
00056   [ -USB_STATUS_PORT_OVERCURRENT    ] = "VBUS overcurrent",
00057 };

00071 char *USB_GetErrorMsgString( int error )
00072 {
00073   if ( error >= 0 )
00074     return (char*)errMsg[ 0 ];
00075 
00076   return (char*)errMsg[ -error ];
00077 }

00092 void USB_PrintErrorMsgString( char *pre, int error )
00093 {
00094   if ( pre )
00095   {
00096     USB_PRINTF( "%s", pre );
00097   }
00098 
00099   if ( error > USB_STATUS_OK )
00100   {
00101     USB_PRINTF( "%d", error );
00102   }
00103   else
00104   {
00105     USB_PRINTF( "%s", USB_GetErrorMsgString( error ) );
00106   }
00107 }

00149 void USBHAL_CoreReset( void )
00150 {
00151   USB->PCGCCTL &= ~USB_PCGCCTL_STOPPCLK;
00152   USB->PCGCCTL &= ~(USB_PCGCCTL_PWRCLMP | USB_PCGCCTL_RSTPDWNMODULE);
00153 
00154   /* Core Soft Reset */
00155   USB->GRSTCTL |= USB_GRSTCTL_CSFTRST;
00156   while ( USB->GRSTCTL & USB_GRSTCTL_CSFTRST ) {}
00157 
00158   USBTIMER_DelayUs( 1 );
00159 
00160   /* Wait for AHB master IDLE state. */
00161   while ( !( USB->GRSTCTL & USB_GRSTCTL_AHBIDLE ) ) {}
00162 }

00164 #ifdef USB_DEVICE
00165 void USBDHAL_Connect( void )
00166 {
00167   USB->DCTL &= ~( DCTL_WO_BITMASK | USB_DCTL_SFTDISCON );
00168 }
00169 
00170 USB_Status_TypeDef USBDHAL_CoreInit( uint32_t totalRxFifoSize,
00171                                      uint32_t totalTxFifoSize )
00172 {
00173   uint8_t i, j;
00174   uint16_t start, depth;
00175   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00176 
00177 #if !defined( USB_VBUS_SWITCH_NOT_PRESENT )
00178   CMU_ClockEnable( cmuClock_GPIO, true );
00179   GPIO_PinModeSet( gpioPortF, 5, gpioModePushPull, 0 ); /* Enable VBUSEN pin */
00180   USB->ROUTE = USB_ROUTE_PHYPEN | USB_ROUTE_VBUSENPEN;  /* Enable PHY pins.  */
00181 #else
00182   USB->ROUTE = USB_ROUTE_PHYPEN;                        /* Enable PHY pins.  */
00183 #endif
00184 
00185   USBHAL_CoreReset();                                   /* Reset USB core    */
00186 
00187 #if defined( USB_GUSBCFG_FORCEHSTMODE )
00188   /* Force Device Mode */
00189   USB->GUSBCFG = ( USB->GUSBCFG                                    &
00190                   ~(GUSBCFG_WO_BITMASK | USB_GUSBCFG_FORCEHSTMODE )  ) |
00191                  USB_GUSBCFG_FORCEDEVMODE;
00192 #endif
00193 
00194   INT_Enable();
00195   USBTIMER_DelayMs( 50 );
00196   INT_Disable();
00197 
00198   /* Set device speed */
00199   USB->DCFG = ( USB->DCFG & ~_USB_DCFG_DEVSPD_MASK ) | 3; /* Full speed PHY */
00200 
00201   /* Stall on non-zero len status OUT packets (ctrl transfers). */
00202   USB->DCFG |= USB_DCFG_NZSTSOUTHSHK;
00203 
00204   /* Set periodic frame interval to 80% */
00205   USB->DCFG &= ~_USB_DCFG_PERFRINT_MASK;
00206 
00207   USB->GAHBCFG = ( USB->GAHBCFG & ~_USB_GAHBCFG_HBSTLEN_MASK ) |
00208                  USB_GAHBCFG_DMAEN | USB_GAHBCFG_HBSTLEN_INCR;
00209 
00210   /* Ignore frame numbers on ISO transfers. */
00211   USB->DCTL = ( USB->DCTL & ~DCTL_WO_BITMASK ) | USB_DCTL_IGNRFRMNUM;
00212 
00213   /* Set Rx FIFO size */
00214   start = EFM32_MAX( totalRxFifoSize, MIN_EP_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS );
00215   USB->GRXFSIZ = ( start << _USB_GRXFSIZ_RXFDEP_SHIFT ) &
00216                  _USB_GRXFSIZ_RXFDEP_MASK;
00217 
00218   /* Set Tx EP0 FIFO size */
00219   depth = EFM32_MAX( dev->ep[ 0 ].fifoSize, MIN_EP_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS );
00220   USB->GNPTXFSIZ = ( ( depth << _USB_GNPTXFSIZ_NPTXFINEPTXF0DEP_SHIFT ) &
00221                      _USB_GNPTXFSIZ_NPTXFINEPTXF0DEP_MASK                 ) |
00222                    ( ( start << _USB_GNPTXFSIZ_NPTXFSTADDR_SHIFT ) &
00223                      _USB_GNPTXFSIZ_NPTXFSTADDR_MASK                      );
00224 
00225 
00226   /* Set Tx EP FIFO sizes for all IN ep's */
00227   for ( j = 1; j <= MAX_NUM_TX_FIFOS; j++ )
00228   {
00229     for ( i = 1; i <= MAX_NUM_IN_EPS; i++ )
00230     {
00231       ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( USB_SETUP_DIR_MASK | i );
00232       if ( ep )                             /* Is EP in use ? */
00233       {
00234         if ( ep->txFifoNum == j )           /* Is it correct FIFO number ? */
00235         {
00236           start += depth;
00237           depth = EFM32_MAX( ep->fifoSize, MIN_EP_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS );
00238           USB_DIEPTXFS[ ep->txFifoNum - 1 ] =
00239                               ( depth << _USB_DIEPTXF1_INEPNTXFDEP_SHIFT   ) |
00240                               ( start &  _USB_DIEPTXF1_INEPNTXFSTADDR_MASK );
00241         }
00242       }
00243     }
00244   }
00245 
00246   if ( totalRxFifoSize + totalTxFifoSize > MAX_DEVICE_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS )
00247     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00248 
00249   if ( start > MAX_DEVICE_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS )
00250     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00251 
00252   /* Flush the FIFO's */
00253   USBHAL_FlushTxFifo( 0x10 );      /* All Tx FIFO's */
00254   USBHAL_FlushRxFifo();            /* The Rx FIFO   */
00255 
00256   /* Disable all device interrupts */
00257   USB->DIEPMSK  = 0;
00258   USB->DOEPMSK  = 0;
00259   USB->DAINTMSK = 0;
00260   USB->DIEPEMPMSK = 0;
00261 
00262   /* Disable all EP's, clear all EP ints. */
00263   for ( i = 0; i <= MAX_NUM_IN_EPS; i++ )
00264   {
00265     USB_DINEPS[ i ].CTL  = 0;
00266     USB_DINEPS[ i ].TSIZ = 0;
00267     USB_DINEPS[ i ].INT  = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00268   }
00269 
00270   for ( i = 0; i <= MAX_NUM_OUT_EPS; i++ )
00271   {
00272     USB_DOUTEPS[ i ].CTL  = 0;
00273     USB_DOUTEPS[ i ].TSIZ = 0;
00274     USB_DOUTEPS[ i ].INT  = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00275   }
00276 
00277 #if ( USB_DCTL_SFTDISCON_DEFAULT != 0 )
00278   USBD_Connect();
00279 #endif
00280 
00281   /* Enable VREGO sense. */
00282   USB->CTRL |= USB_CTRL_VREGOSEN;
00283   USB->IFC   = USB_IFC_VREGOSH | USB_IFC_VREGOSL;
00284   USB->IEN   = USB_IFC_VREGOSH | USB_IFC_VREGOSL;
00285   /* Force a VREGO interrupt. */
00286   if ( USB->STATUS & USB_STATUS_VREGOS)
00287     USB->IFS = USB_IFS_VREGOSH;
00288   else
00289     USB->IFS = USB_IFS_VREGOSL;
00290 
00291   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00292 }
00293 
00294 void USBDHAL_Disconnect( void )
00295 {
00296   USB->DCTL = ( USB->DCTL & ~DCTL_WO_BITMASK ) | USB_DCTL_SFTDISCON;
00297 }
00298 
00299 void USBDHAL_AbortEpIn( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00300 {
00301   /* Clear epdis & inepnakeff INT's */
00302   USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].INT |= USB_DIEP_INT_EPDISBLD |
00303                                USB_DIEP_INT_INEPNAKEFF;
00304 
00305   /* Enable epdis & inepnakeff INT's */
00306   USB->DIEPMSK |= USB_DIEPMSK_EPDISBLDMSK | USB_DIEPMSK_INEPNAKEFFMSK;
00307   USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = ( USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL  &
00308                                 ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK           ) |
00309                               USB_DIEP_CTL_SNAK;
00310 
00311   /* Wait for inepnakeff INT */
00312   while ( !( USBDHAL_GetInEpInts( ep ) & USB_DIEP_INT_INEPNAKEFF ) ) {}
00313   USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].INT = USB_DIEP_INT_INEPNAKEFF;
00314   USB->DIEPMSK &= ~USB_DIEPMSK_INEPNAKEFFMSK;
00315 
00316   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '.' );
00317 
00318   USBDHAL_SetEPDISNAK( ep );
00319   /* Wait for epdis INT */
00320   while ( !( USBDHAL_GetInEpInts( ep ) & USB_DIEP_INT_EPDISBLD ) ) {}
00321   USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].INT = USB_DIEP_INT_EPDISBLD;
00322   USB->DIEPMSK &= ~USB_DIEPMSK_EPDISBLDMSK;
00323   USBHAL_FlushTxFifo( ep->txFifoNum );
00324 
00325   /* Clear any interrupts generated by the abort sequence. */
00326   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00327 
00328   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '.' );
00329 }
00330 
00331 void USBDHAL_AbortEpOut( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00332 {
00333   int cnt;
00334 
00335   /* Clear epdis INT's */
00336   USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].INT |= USB_DOEP_INT_EPDISBLD;
00337 
00338   /* Clear Global OUT NAK if already set */
00339   USB->DCTL = ( USB->DCTL & ~DCTL_WO_BITMASK ) | USB_DCTL_CGOUTNAK;
00340   USB->GINTMSK |= USB_GINTMSK_GOUTNAKEFFMSK;    /* Enable GOUTNAKEFF int */
00341 
00342   /* Set Global OUT NAK */
00343   USB->DCTL = ( USB->DCTL & ~DCTL_WO_BITMASK ) | USB_DCTL_SGOUTNAK;
00344 
00345   /* Wait for goutnakeff */
00346   cnt = EPABORT_BREAK_LOOP_COUNT;
00347   while ( !( USB->GINTSTS & USB_GINTSTS_GOUTNAKEFF ) && cnt )
00348   {
00349     cnt--;
00350   }
00351 
00352   USB->GINTMSK &= ~USB_GINTMSK_GOUTNAKEFFMSK; /* Disable GOUTNAKEFF int  */
00353   USB->DOEPMSK |= USB_DOEPMSK_EPDISBLDMSK;    /* Enable EPDIS interrupt  */
00354 
00355   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( ',' );
00356 
00357   USBDHAL_SetEPDISNAK( ep );                  /* Disable ep */
00358 
00359   /* Wait for epdis INT */
00360   cnt = EPABORT_BREAK_LOOP_COUNT;
00361   while ( !( USBDHAL_GetOutEpInts( ep ) & USB_DOEP_INT_EPDISBLD ) && cnt )
00362   {
00363     cnt--;
00364   }
00365 
00366   USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].INT = USB_DOEP_INT_EPDISBLD;
00367   USB->DOEPMSK &= ~USB_DOEPMSK_EPDISBLDMSK;     /* Disable EPDIS interrupt */
00368 
00369   /* Clear Global OUT NAK */
00370   USB->DCTL = ( USB->DCTL & ~DCTL_WO_BITMASK ) | USB_DCTL_CGOUTNAK;
00371 
00372   /* Clear any interrupts generated by the abort sequence. */
00373   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00374 
00375   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( ',' );
00376 }
00377 
00378 void USBDHAL_AbortAllEps( void )
00379 {
00380   int i, cnt;
00381   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00382   uint16_t im, om, inmask=0, outmask=0;
00383 
00384   /* Clear epdis & inepnakeff INT's */
00385   for ( i = 1; i <= NUM_EP_USED; i++ )
00386   {
00387     ep = &dev->ep[i];
00388     if ( ep->state != D_EP_IDLE )
00389     {
00390       if ( ep->in )
00391       {
00392         inmask |= ep->mask;
00393         USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].INT |= USB_DIEP_INT_EPDISBLD |
00394                                      USB_DIEP_INT_INEPNAKEFF;
00395       }
00396       else
00397       {
00398         outmask |= ep->mask;
00399         USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].INT |= USB_DOEP_INT_EPDISBLD;
00400       }
00401     }
00402   }
00403 
00404   if ( inmask )
00405   {
00406     /* Enable epdis & inepnakeff INT's */
00407     USB->DIEPMSK |= USB_DIEPMSK_EPDISBLDMSK | USB_DIEPMSK_INEPNAKEFFMSK;
00408 
00409     /* Set NAK on all IN ep's */
00410     im = inmask;
00411     for ( i = 1; i <= NUM_EP_USED; i++ )
00412     {
00413       ep = &dev->ep[i];
00414       if ( im & ep->mask )
00415       {
00416         USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL = ( USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].CTL &
00417                                       ~DEPCTL_WO_BITMASK          ) |
00418                                     USB_DIEP_CTL_SNAK;
00419       }
00420     }
00421   }
00422 
00423   if ( outmask )
00424   {
00425     /* Clear Global OUT NAK if already set */
00426     USB->DCTL = ( USB->DCTL & ~DCTL_WO_BITMASK ) | USB_DCTL_CGOUTNAK;
00427 
00428     USB->GINTMSK |= USB_GINTMSK_GOUTNAKEFFMSK;    /* Enable GOUTNAKEFF int */
00429 
00430     /* Set Global OUT NAK */
00431     USB->DCTL = ( USB->DCTL & ~DCTL_WO_BITMASK ) | USB_DCTL_SGOUTNAK;
00432 
00433     /* Wait for goutnakeff */
00434     cnt = EPABORT_BREAK_LOOP_COUNT;
00435     while ( !( USB->GINTSTS & USB_GINTSTS_GOUTNAKEFF ) && cnt )
00436     {
00437       cnt--;
00438     }
00439     USB->GINTMSK &= ~USB_GINTMSK_GOUTNAKEFFMSK; /* Disable GOUTNAKEFF int  */
00440     USB->DOEPMSK |= USB_DOEPMSK_EPDISBLDMSK;    /* Enable EPDIS interrupt  */
00441   }
00442 
00443   if ( inmask )
00444   {
00445     /* Wait for inepnakeff INT on all IN ep's */
00446     im  = inmask;
00447     cnt = EPABORT_BREAK_LOOP_COUNT;
00448     do
00449     {
00450       for ( i = 1; i <= NUM_EP_USED; i++ )
00451       {
00452         ep = &dev->ep[i];
00453         if ( im & ep->mask )
00454         {
00455           if ( USBDHAL_GetInEpInts( ep ) & USB_DIEP_INT_INEPNAKEFF )
00456           {
00457             USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].INT = USB_DIEP_INT_INEPNAKEFF;
00458             im &= ~ep->mask;
00459           }
00460         }
00461       }
00462       cnt--;
00463     } while ( im && cnt );
00464     USB->DIEPMSK &= ~USB_DIEPMSK_INEPNAKEFFMSK;
00465   }
00466 
00467   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '\'' );
00468 
00469   /* Disable ep's */
00470   for ( i = 1; i <= NUM_EP_USED; i++ )
00471   {
00472     ep = &dev->ep[i];
00473     if ( ep->state != D_EP_IDLE )
00474     {
00475       USBDHAL_SetEPDISNAK( ep );
00476     }
00477   }
00478 
00479   /* Wait for epdis INT */
00480   im  = inmask;
00481   om  = outmask;
00482   cnt = EPABORT_BREAK_LOOP_COUNT;
00483   do
00484   {
00485     for ( i = 1; i <= NUM_EP_USED; i++ )
00486     {
00487       ep = &dev->ep[i];
00488       if ( ep->in && ( im & ep->mask ) )
00489       {
00490         if ( USBDHAL_GetInEpInts( ep ) & USB_DIEP_INT_EPDISBLD )
00491         {
00492           USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].INT = USB_DIEP_INT_EPDISBLD;
00493           im &= ~ep->mask;
00494         }
00495       }
00496 
00497       if ( !ep->in && ( om & ep->mask ) )
00498       {
00499         if ( USBDHAL_GetOutEpInts( ep ) & USB_DOEP_INT_EPDISBLD )
00500         {
00501           USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].INT = USB_DOEP_INT_EPDISBLD;
00502           om &= ~ep->mask;
00503         }
00504       }
00505     }
00506     cnt--;
00507   } while ( ( im || om ) && cnt );
00508 
00509   if ( inmask )
00510   {
00511     USB->DIEPMSK &= ~USB_DIEPMSK_EPDISBLDMSK;     /* Disable EPDIS interrupt */
00512     USBHAL_FlushTxFifo( 0x10 );                   /* Flush all Tx FIFO's     */
00513   }
00514 
00515   if ( outmask )
00516   {
00517     USB->DOEPMSK &= ~USB_DOEPMSK_EPDISBLDMSK;     /* Disable EPDIS interrupt */
00518     /* Clear Global OUT NAK */
00519     USB->DCTL = ( USB->DCTL & ~DCTL_WO_BITMASK ) | USB_DCTL_CGOUTNAK;
00520   }
00521 
00522   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '\'' );
00523 }
00524 
00525 void USBDHAL_AbortAllTransfers( USB_Status_TypeDef reason )
00526 {
00527   int i;
00528   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00529   USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback;
00530 
00531   if ( reason != USB_STATUS_DEVICE_RESET )
00532   {
00533     USBDHAL_AbortAllEps();
00534   }
00535 
00536   for ( i = 1; i <= NUM_EP_USED; i++ )
00537   {
00538     ep = &(dev->ep[i]);
00539     if ( ep->state != D_EP_IDLE )
00540     {
00541       ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00542       if ( ep->xferCompleteCb )
00543       {
00544         callback = ep->xferCompleteCb;
00545         ep->xferCompleteCb = NULL;
00546 
00547         if ( ( dev->lastState == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED ) &&
00548              ( dev->state     == USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED  )    )
00549         {
00550           USBDHAL_DeactivateEp( ep );
00551         }
00552 
00553         DEBUG_TRACE_ABORT( reason );
00554         callback( reason, ep->xferred, ep->remaining );
00555       }
00556     }
00557   }
00558 
00559   /* Clear any interrupts generated by the abort sequence. */
00560   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00561 }
00562 #endif /* defined( USB_DEVICE ) */
00563 
00564 #if defined( USB_HOST )
00565 USB_Status_TypeDef USBHHAL_CoreInit( uint32_t rxFifoSize,
00566                                      uint32_t nptxFifoSize,
00567                                      uint32_t ptxFifoSize )
00568 {
00569   uint8_t i;
00570 
00571   rxFifoSize   /= 4;              /* Convert from byte count to word count.  */
00572   nptxFifoSize /= 4;
00573   ptxFifoSize  /= 4;
00574 
00575   CMU_ClockEnable( cmuClock_GPIO, true );
00576   GPIO_PinModeSet( gpioPortF, 5, gpioModePushPull, 0 ); /* Enable VBUSEN pin */
00577 
00578 #if ( USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT != USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT_NONE )
00579   /* Enable VBUS overcurrent flag pin. */
00580   GPIO_PinModeSet( USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT, USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PIN, gpioModeInput, 0 );
00581 #endif
00582 
00583   USB->ROUTE = USB_ROUTE_PHYPEN | USB_ROUTE_VBUSENPEN;  /* Enable PHY pins.  */
00584   USBHAL_CoreReset();                                   /* Reset USB core    */
00585 
00586   /* Force Host Mode */
00587   USB->GUSBCFG = ( USB->GUSBCFG                                     &
00588                    ~(GUSBCFG_WO_BITMASK | USB_GUSBCFG_FORCEDEVMODE )  ) |
00589                  USB_GUSBCFG_FORCEHSTMODE;
00590 
00591   INT_Enable();
00592   USBTIMER_DelayMs( 100 );
00593   INT_Disable();
00594 
00595   /* Set 48 MHz PHY clock, FS/LS mode */
00596   USB->HCFG = ( USB->HCFG & ~_USB_HCFG_FSLSPCLKSEL_MASK ) |
00597               ( 1 << _USB_HCFG_FSLSPCLKSEL_SHIFT        ) |
00598               ( USB_HCFG_FSLSSUPP                       );
00599 
00600   USB->GAHBCFG = ( USB->GAHBCFG & ~_USB_GAHBCFG_HBSTLEN_MASK ) |
00601                  USB_GAHBCFG_DMAEN | USB_GAHBCFG_HBSTLEN_INCR;
00602 
00603   /* Set Rx FIFO size */
00604   USB->GRXFSIZ = ( rxFifoSize << _USB_GRXFSIZ_RXFDEP_SHIFT ) &
00605                  _USB_GRXFSIZ_RXFDEP_MASK;
00606 
00607   /* Set Tx FIFO sizes */
00608   USB->GNPTXFSIZ = ( ( nptxFifoSize <<
00609                        _USB_GNPTXFSIZ_NPTXFINEPTXF0DEP_SHIFT ) &
00610                      _USB_GNPTXFSIZ_NPTXFINEPTXF0DEP_MASK        ) |
00611                    ( ( rxFifoSize <<
00612                        _USB_GNPTXFSIZ_NPTXFSTADDR_SHIFT      ) &
00613                      _USB_GNPTXFSIZ_NPTXFSTADDR_MASK             );
00614 
00615   USB->HPTXFSIZ  = ( ( ptxFifoSize  << _USB_HPTXFSIZ_PTXFSIZE_SHIFT   ) &
00616                      _USB_HPTXFSIZ_PTXFSIZE_MASK                          ) |
00617                    ( ( ( rxFifoSize + nptxFifoSize )
00618                                     << _USB_HPTXFSIZ_PTXFSTADDR_SHIFT ) &
00619                      _USB_HPTXFSIZ_PTXFSTADDR_MASK                        );
00620 
00621   /* Flush Tx and Rx FIFO's */
00622   USBHAL_FlushTxFifo( 0x10 );
00623   USBHAL_FlushRxFifo();
00624 
00625   for ( i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_HOSTCHANNELS; i++ )
00626   {
00627     USB->HC[ i ].CHAR = USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS;      /* Disable channel          */
00628     USB->HC[ i ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;              /* Clear pending interrupts */
00629   }
00630 
00631   /* Enable and halt all channels */
00632   for ( i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_HOSTCHANNELS; i++ )
00633   {
00634     USB->HC[ i ].CHAR |= USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS | USB_HC_CHAR_CHENA;
00635     do
00636     {
00637       __NOP(); __NOP(); __NOP(); __NOP(); __NOP(); __NOP();
00638     }
00639     while ( USB->HC[ i ].CHAR & USB_HC_CHAR_CHENA );
00640   }
00641 
00642   /* Disable all interrupts */
00643   for ( i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_HOSTCHANNELS; i++ )
00644   {
00645     USB->HC[ i ].INTMSK = 0;
00646   }
00647 
00648   USB->HAINTMSK = 0;
00649 
00650   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00651 }
00652 
00653 void USBHHAL_HCHalt( int hcnum, uint32_t hcchar )
00654 {
00655   hcchar |= USB_HC_CHAR_CHENA | USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS;
00656   USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR = hcchar;
00657 }
00658 
00659 void USBHHAL_HCInit( int hcnum )
00660 {
00661   USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00662 
00663   ep = hcs[ hcnum ].ep;
00664   USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;      /* Clear all interrupt flags      */
00665 
00666   switch ( ep->type )                     /* Enable host channel int. types */
00667   {
00668     case USB_EPTYPE_CTRL:
00669     case USB_EPTYPE_BULK:
00670     case USB_EPTYPE_INTR:
00671       USB->HC[ hcnum ].INTMSK = USB_HC_INT_CHHLTD;
00672       break;
00673   }
00674 
00675   hcs[ hcnum ].errorCnt = 0;
00676 
00677   USB->HAINTMSK |= 1 << hcnum;            /* Enable host channel interrupt  */
00678 
00679   USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR =                 /* Program HCCHAR register        */
00680       ( ep->parentDevice->addr     <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_DEVADDR_SHIFT     ) |
00681       ( ( ep->addr & USB_EPNUM_MASK ) << _USB_HC_CHAR_EPNUM_SHIFT      ) |
00682       ( ep->type                   <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_EPTYPE_SHIFT      ) |
00683       ( ep->packetSize             <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_MPS_SHIFT         ) |
00684       ( ep->in                      ?   USB_HC_CHAR_EPDIR         : 0  ) |
00685       ( ep->parentDevice->speed ==
00686                            HPRT_L_SPEED >> _USB_HPRT_PRTSPD_SHIFT
00687                                     ?   USB_HC_CHAR_LSPDDEV       : 0  );
00688 }
00689 
00690 void USBHHAL_HCStart( int hcnum )
00691 {
00692   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc;
00693   uint16_t packets, len;
00694 
00695   hc = &hcs[ hcnum ];
00696   hc->status = 0;
00697   hc->idle = false;
00698 
00699   if ( hc->remaining > 0 )
00700   {
00701     packets = ( hc->remaining + hc->ep->packetSize - 1 ) / hc->ep->packetSize;
00702   }
00703   else
00704   {
00705     packets = 1;
00706   }
00707 
00708   if ( hc->ep->in )
00709   {
00710     len = packets * hc->ep->packetSize;
00711   }
00712   else
00713   {
00714     len = hc->remaining;
00715   }
00716 
00717   /* Initialize the HCTSIZn register */
00718   hc->hwXferSize = len;
00719   USB->HC[ hcnum ].TSIZ =
00720           ( ( len             << _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT ) &
00721                                  _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_MASK       ) |
00722           ( ( packets         << _USB_HC_TSIZ_PKTCNT_SHIFT   ) &
00723                                  _USB_HC_TSIZ_PKTCNT_MASK         ) |
00724           ( ( hc->ep->toggle  << _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_SHIFT      ) &
00725                                  _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_MASK            );
00726 
00727   USB->HC[ hcnum ].DMAADDR = (uint32_t)hc->buf;
00728 
00729   USBHHAL_HCActivate( hcnum,
00730                       USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR,
00731                       hc->ep->type == USB_EPTYPE_INTR );
00732 }
00733 #endif /* defined( USB_HOST ) */
00734 
00737 #endif /* defined( USB_DEVICE ) || defined( USB_HOST ) */
00738 #endif /* defined( USB_PRESENT ) && ( USB_COUNT == 1 ) */
